application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1. Walnut, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 1 metre. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 4 meters tall and 4 meters wide.T2. Acer, light reduction (<0.5m) and thin by 15%. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 2 meters tall and 1.5 meters wideT3. Bay, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 2 metres. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 5 meters tall and 4 meters wideT4. Yew, Trim hard all round to shape and contain and remove stem/trunk overhanging neighbouring property to height of wall. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 5 meters tall and 4 meters wideT5. Apple,  Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 1 metre. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 2 meters tall and 1.5 meters wideT6. Cercis, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 1 metre. Estimated height and spread upon completion of works 2 meters tall and 1 meter wideT7. Silver Birch x 5, Fell - Running along the front boundary of the front garden, in close proximity to boundary line wall and a street light. Young/establishing trees initially planted to provide screening from the road to the lower elevation of the property. The trees have now however grown to a height of approx. 9-10 meters tall, creating a tall dense screen when in leaf. Suggested works are too: Fell to ground level by sectional take down, grind out Stump 200mm below ground level and replant with two smaller trees (e.g. Amelanchier).
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
Works agreed to tree labelled T3
Works agreed to tree labelled T7
Works agreed to tree labelled T5
Works agreed to tree labelled T6
Works agreed to tree labelled T4
